titles.title: We're Going To Overcome You As A Man

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus was in the wilderness, when He heard a voice that said.
If you are the Son of God, then turn these stones to bread
But He said, It is written, man shall not live just by bread.
But by every word of God; by every word of God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We're going to overcome you as a man
We're going to overcome you as a man.
You'd like it to be by some mystical power divine.
But we're going to overcome you as a man.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In these days the body is being tested and tried
Tested and tried in every way for the Devil to turn aside.
But we can't go any other way but the straight and narrow way.
But the straight and narrow way; the straight and narrow way.
